properties.description: Sets the status message from a calling pipeline and constructs a subject and a message

activities.name: Switch Status
activities.description: Construct a message and subject depending on the supplied status of either 'success' or 'failed'

message.value: @concat(pipeline().parameters.triggeredPipeline, ' has no valid status: ', pipeline().parameters.status, ' expecting Failed or Success')

schema.name: Total number of tasks compeleted within Period
Number of tasks completed on time
Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 1
Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 2
Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 3
Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 4
Additional Time Parameter 2 Performance Charge Value
Additional Time Parameter 3 Performance Charge Value
Additional Time Parameter 4 Performance Charge Value

properties.description: Connection to the Buyalot Website Data

scriptLines: {Total number of tasks compeleted within Period} as integer,
{Number of tasks completed on time} as short,
{Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 1} as integer,
{Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 2} as integer,
{Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 3} as short,
{Number of tasks completed later than Time Parameter 4} as short,
{Time Parameter 1 Performance Charge Value} as integer,
{Additional Time Parameter 2 Performance Charge Value} as integer,
{Additional Time Parameter 3 Performance Charge Value} as integer,
{Additional Time Parameter 4 Performance Charge Value} as integer,
{Performance Charge Retailer credited value} as integer,
{Performance Charge MO credited value} as integer
TotalTasksCompeleted = {Total number of tasks compeleted within Period},
TasksCompletedOnTime = {Number of tasks completed on time},
